nodes.text: A toilet was a fixture found in refreshers, used for the disposal of bodily wastes. Toilet paper was used to maintain personal hygiene.
Dianogas were sometimes known to live in and crawl out of a toilet.
Medical droids were sometimes reprogrammed to work as toilet cleaners in the military.
In Robot Chicken: Star Wars, an AT-AT pilot is seen using a toilet in Blizzard 4, where Luke Skywalker throws explosives into at the Battle of Hoth.

In a comic strip appearing in MAD magazine's "A MAD look at Star Wars," Luke Skywalker is directed to the lavatory in Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina, where he finds a bewildering array of urinals designed for various aliens' physiology.
